mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN FNC.LEVEL-1 > 0 THEN CONCAT(CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', FNC.LEVEL - 1),' '), M.NAME) ELSE M.NAME END AS NAME , M.MENU_ID , M.PID , M.URL , M.TYPE , M.ORDERING , M.USE_YN , M.DESCRIPTION , FNC.LEVEL FROM( SELECT fn_hierarchi() AS ID , @level AS LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @start_with:=0 , @id:=@start_with , @level:=0 ) VARS JOIN komsia.ks_menu WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) FNC JOIN komsia.ks_menu M ON FNC.ID = M.MENU_ID
SELECT MENU_ID , LEVEL , NAME , URL FROM KS_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND TYPE = 'M'
SELECT NAME FROM KS_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND URL = #{url} AND TYPE = 'M'
SELECT * FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE PID = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND URL != '/user' ORDER BY ORDERING
SELECT IFNULL(MENU_ID,0) MENU_ID FROM KOMSIA.KS_MENU WHERE URL = #{url}
